summary: [b]Add A perk and increase some abilities[/b]
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][b][center] Skills And Perks
-Seperated- [/size][/b][/center]

[size=3][b]
EDITED SKILLS AND PERKS:


 *Conjuration*
  *Sneak*


------------------------------------------------------ 
 Changes:

[color=red] ~~Conjuration~~[/color]

My Perk:

Oblivion Summon:
- Can revive and summon 1 up to 10 creatures 
- Requires Novice Conjuration
  Requires 45 Conjuration

 Vanilla Spells:
 
- Raise zombie 
   lvl 6 Changed to 10
   1 min

 - Reanimate Corpse
   lvl 13 Changed to 20
   1 min Changed to 2 min

-  Revenant
   lvl 21 Changed to 30
   1 min Changed to 3 min

-  Deadthrall
   lvl 40 Changed to 50

My spells:

-  Raise Undead(Can obtain when oblivion summon is unlock)
   lvl (ANY)
   (No time)
   When you use this spell, your raised creature will not turn into ashe when it died

NOTE: The magicka cost of the spell is based on your attributes/skills/perks

[color=red]~~Sneak~~[/color]
 
My Perks:

 Vengeance
- Your weapons deals more damage
- require 50 sneak, has stealth and assassin\'s jump

 Assassin\'s Jump
- Reduce fall damage by 55
- require 45 sneak and has stealth

Vanilla perks:

 Stealth 1
 - 20% Changed to 25 %
 Stealth 2
 - 25% Changed to 30%
 Stealth 3
 - 30% Changed to 35%
 Stealth 4
 - 35% Changed to 40%
 Stealth 5
 - 40% Changed to 50%

Muffled movement
- 50% Changed to 70%

Silence
- Improved

Backstab
- 6 times Changed to 7 times

Deadly Aim
- 3 times Changed to 4 tmes

Assassin\'s Blade
- 15 times Changed to 16 times

 My Spells:

 Unseen(added when Assassin\'s Jump is unlocked)
- Invisibility
- 120 min

-------------------------------------------
Version:

V.1 Conjure = Conjuration skill and perk
V.1 Sneak = Sneak skill and perk
-------------------------------------------
Compability:

 Not compatible on other no summon limit .
 I dont know if it works on other conjuration perks, skills.
 But im 95% Sure it works on summoning spells etc.

-------------------------------------------
Bugs:

 Didnt see any , works on me .. tell me if you had one

-------------------------------------------
Requirement

Higher patch of skyrim (as always XD)

-------------------------------------------
Im going to edit other perks so you can enjoy smooth play, and so on :))
[/size][/b]
author: Abram1
